option.name: domain_name
option.description: Domain Name: for instance: hamidev.com or hamidbehnam.com

option.name: project_category
option.description: The Project Category section in the url: the final url is going to be something like this: hamidev.com/project_category/project_path, for instance hamidev.com/angular/102

option.name: project_path
option.description: The Project Path section in the url: the final url is going to be something like this: hamidev.com/project_category/project_path, for instance hamidev.com/angular/102

option.name: deployment_branch
option.description: Deployment Branch, declares the source branch in the dest repository that we're gonna deploy to the server, master, qa, dev, ... .

option.name: dest_repo
option.description: The path to the project's dest repo, without https. for instance: github.com/HamidBehnam/hamidev-mobile-dev-env-angular-dest.git

job.description:
The first rundeck job.
Description for the first rundeck job.
job.name: Angular Deployment V1

command.script: cd / sudo rm -rf @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo mkdir @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp is created. cd @option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo downloading the project. sudo git clone --single-branch --branch @option.deployment_branch@ https://@option.dest_repo@ .

if [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "master" ] then sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@ echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/ else sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@ echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@ echo the destination is created. cd /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_category@/@option.project_path@/ fi
echo the artifacts are copied to the destination. sudo rm -rf /@option.project_category@_@option.project_path@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo the temp direcotry is removed.
